description: Number of different values of i^2+j^2+k^2+l^2 for i,j,k,l in [ 0,n ].
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=0..100
mathematica: Table[ Length@Union@Flatten@Table[ i^2+j^2+k^2+l^2, {i, 0, n}, {j, i, n}, {k, j, n}, {l, k, n} ], {n, 0, 48} ]
author: _Wouter Meeussen_
extensions: Definition corrected by _Jonathan Vos Post_, Nov 14 2007
